name: RecordSpec
typ: Type -> Type

name: RecordField
typ: String -> Type -> Type
(0 s : String) -> t -> RecordField s t

name: Field
typ: String -> Type -> Type
(s : String) -> t -> Field s t

name: FieldSpec
typ: Field s t -> t

name: FieldToType
typ: Type -> Type

name: Record
typ: RecordSpec k -> FieldToType k -> Type

name: Nil
typ: {0 f : FieldToType k} -> Record [] (\{s:894} => f)
{0 f : FieldToType k} -> RecordField lbl (f (lbl :->: t)) -> Record xs (\{s:920} => f) -> Record ((lbl, t) :: xs) (\{s:928} => f)

name: SimpleRecord
typ: RecordSpec Type -> Type

name: AllConstraints
typ: (a -> Type) -> List a -> Type

name: HasField
typ: String -> k -> RecordSpec k -> Type

name: FirstField
typ: HasField s t ((s, t) :: {_:1009})

name: NextField
typ: {auto 0 _ : t == s = False} -> HasField s v xs -> HasField s v ((t, w) :: xs)

name: HasField'
typ: RecordSpec k -> (String, k) -> Type

name: HasFields
typ: RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k -> Type

name: LabelOf
typ: RecordSpec k -> Type

name: MkLabel
typ: (lbl : String) -> HasField lbl t spec => LabelOf spec

name: labelString
typ: LabelOf spec -> String

name: labelSpec
typ: LabelOf spec -> k

name: IsNothing
typ: Maybe a -> Type

name: ItIsNothing
typ: IsNothing Nothing

name: HasOptionalField
typ: String -> k -> RecordSpec k -> Type

name: NoSuchField
typ: IsNothing (lookup s specs) => HasOptionalField s t specs

name: FieldExists
typ: HasField s t specs => HasOptionalField s t specs

name: HasOptionalField'
typ: RecordSpec k -> (String, k) -> Type

name: HasOptionalFields
typ: RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k -> Type

name: remField
typ: RecordSpec k -> (String, k) -> RecordSpec k

name: remFields
typ: RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k

name: NubFields
typ: RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k -> Type

name: MkNubFields
typ: NubFields spec fields (remFields spec fields)

name: WithRecordFields
typ: RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k -> RecordSpec k -> Type

name: MkWithRecordFields
typ: HasFields spec mandatory => NubFields spec (optional ++ mandatory) other => WithRecordFields spec mandatory optional other

name: hasFieldToIndex
typ: HasField s t r -> Integer

name: get
typ: (0 lbl : String) -> {0 f : FieldToType k} -> HasField lbl t r => Record r (\{s:1502} => f) -> f (lbl :->: t)

name: SpecGet
typ: (0 lbl : String) -> (r : RecordSpec k) -> HasField lbl t r => k
{0 f : FieldToType k} -> Record r (\{s:1640} => f) -> (0 lbl : String) -> HasField lbl t r => f (lbl :->: t)

name: getMaybe
typ: {0 f : FieldToType k} -> (0 s : String) -> HasOptionalField s t r => Record r (\{s:1698} => f) -> Maybe (f (s :->: t))

name: getOpt
typ: {0 f : FieldToType k} -> (0 s : String) -> HasOptionalField s t r => Lazy (f (s :->: t)) -> Record r (\{s:1783} => f) -> f (s :->: t)

name: set
typ: {0 f : FieldToType k} -> RecordField lbl (f (lbl :->: t)) -> HasField lbl t r => Record r (\{s:1839} => f) -> Record r (\{s:1846} => f)

name: mapRecord
typ: {0 f : FieldToType k} -> {0 g : FieldToType k} -> (f (lbl :->: spec) -> g (lbl :->: spec)) -> Record specs (\{s:1972} => f) -> Record specs (\{s:1979} => g)

name: sequenceRecord
typ: Applicative m => {0 f : FieldToType k} -> Record spec (\{s:2068} => m . f) -> m (Record spec (\{s:2080} => f))

name: traverseRecord
typ: Applicative m => {0 f : FieldToType k} -> {0 g : FieldToType k} -> (f (lbl :->: spec) -> m (g (lbl :->: spec))) -> Record specs (\{s:2204} => f) -> m (Record specs (\{s:2211} => g))

name: aseq
typ: Applicative m => Record spec (\{s:2334} => m . FieldSpec) -> m (SimpleRecord spec)

name: mapRecordSpec
typ: {0 f : FieldToType k} -> (spec : RecordSpec k) -> ((label : String) -> (spec : k) -> f (label :->: spec)) -> Record spec (\{s:2384} => f)

name: traverseRecordSpec
typ: Applicative m => {0 f : FieldToType k} -> (spec : RecordSpec k) -> ((label : String) -> (spec : k) -> m (f (label :->: spec))) -> m (Record spec (\{s:2453} => f))

name: zipWithRecord
typ: {0 f : FieldToType k} -> {0 g : FieldToType k} -> {0 h : FieldToType k} -> (f (s :->: a) -> g (s :->: a) -> h (s :->: a)) -> Record spec (\{s:2575} => f) -> Record spec (\{s:2584} => g) -> Record spec (\{s:2591} => h)

name: HkdList
typ: (k -> Type) -> List k -> Type

name: mapHkd
typ: (f a -> g a) -> HkdList f s -> HkdList g s

name: zipWithManyRecord
typ: {g : FieldToType k} -> (HkdList (\{arg:0} => {arg:0} (s :->: a)) fs -> g (s :->: a)) -> HkdList (Record spec) fs -> Record spec (\{s:2997} => g)

name: foldMapRecord
typ: Monoid m => {f : FieldToType k} -> (f (s :->: a) -> m) -> Record spec (\{s:3165} => f) -> m

name: foldrRecord
typ: {f : FieldToType k} -> (f (s :->: a) -> acc -> acc) -> acc -> Record spec (\{s:3268} => f) -> acc

name: foldlRecord
typ: {f : FieldToType k} -> (acc -> f (s :->: a) -> acc) -> acc -> Record spec (\{s:3361} => f) -> acc

name: recordLabels
typ: Record spec (\{s:3427} => const String)

name: EntryDict
typ: ((String, k) -> Type) -> FieldToType k

name: recordDicts
typ: (0 c : ((String, k) -> Type)) -> (spec : RecordSpec k) -> AllConstraints c spec => Record spec (\{s:3498} => EntryDict c)

name: recordSpecs
typ: (l : RecordSpec k) -> Record l (\{s:3550} => const k)

name: concatRecords
typ: {f : FieldToType k} -> Record spec1 (\{s:3594} => f) -> Record spec2 (\{s:3603} => f) -> Record (spec1 ++ spec2) (\{s:3611} => f)

name: RecordSubset
typ: List (LabelOf spec) -> RecordSpec k

name: recordSubset
typ: {f : FieldToType k} -> (labels : List (LabelOf spec)) -> Record spec (\{s:3709} => f) -> Record (RecordSubset labels) (\{s:3718} => f)
